thread.title: Old fashion excellence hoteliers
thread.title_full: Old fashion excellence hoteliers - Review of Hotel Raphael, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: PaperRep
title: Old fashion excellence hoteliers
text:
It is so nice and so rare to feel home in a long time historical Paris landmark hotel. Hotel Raphael manages to keep charm of historical building and modern 5 * equipments. You imediatly feel connected with parisian history and today's world
Room Tip: Rooms facing Peninsula hotels are great and quiet See more room tips
